templates.name: Process exists
templates.script: if [ $(pgrep {{process}} | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then exit 1; else exit 0

templates.name: Current user is not _mbusersetup
templates.script: if [ $(/bin/ls -l /dev/console | /usr/bin/awk '{ print $3 }') != "_mbusersetup" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0
templates.comments: test if the OS is still in the setup steps. Detect when setup ends. Can be combined with test of process Finder exists
